segments.text: I would like to order cable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , what package do you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kinds of packages do you offer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have all kinds of movie channel packages .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is a package for all sports channels .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a package that includes all the movie channels with the basic channels also ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we do offer that package .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , but is it possible for me to add channels later ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can always get rid of channels or add some later .
segments.speaker: S2
